body: This award works like arcane study I, except you can prepare one 2nd-level wizard spell, and the Intelligence damage is 1d4 instead of 1d3. You can use this award and arcane study I at the same time. You can't select this award if you're a wizard.
name: Arcane Study II
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Campaign Systems/Reputation And Fame/Reputation and Fame/Awards/Fame 20/Arcane Study II
